column4: When i plug my Pen Drive, and try to create folder or file in it, it says no permission for writing in this device, can anyone tell whats the problem
i can copy things in it
but cant create anything in it
is it a mac osx drive?
I can tell you why. Its formatted ExFat, which is a format not supported natively in linux
so what should i do it ? format it in NTFS ?
well i have bad experince converting FAT to NTFS drive for Pen Drive
Just back up all your data you should be fine
Format it in Windows, select NTFS
you can do so by going into my computer, right clicking the drive, and click format
Make sure to back up data on it
